ygData.subject: Re: Voice Communications: BattleCom vs Roger Wilco
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you guys actually run other programs while running EQ???  I can t alt-tab to anything else without totally screwing EQ and having to ctl-alt-del it to get
ygData.messageBody:
Can you guys actually run other programs while running
EQ??? I can't alt-tab to anything else without totally
screwing EQ and having to ctl-alt-del it to get it to
close down. It really messes with my graphics. Before I
start up EQ I close everything else down ... including my
anti-virus software (hate having a scan during a melee
... it's like fighting thru pudding!).

Based on this thread, I'm now wondering if it's just
because my poor 'puter is just powerful enough to run EQ.
If that's the case, then woohoo! cuz I'm waiting for my
new puter to be built. How do you guys run the voice
communication software while running EQ? I'm curious.

Safe travels,
Wynsong
Woodelf Bard, Level 4 (!!!)
Rivervale, Quellious
(currently on working holiday in Freeport, lol)



--
~~~ Remember that our illusion of control is just
that ... an illusion ~~~

weya@...
weya@...
ICQ#1976509

>From: Olmoss@...
>
>Before finishing reading this pop over to GameSpot.com and
>do a FULL TEXT (not title) search on Battlecom and you will
>get a CGW article from the July issue (the one with the big
>QUAKE III in yellow on the cover) discussing the merits of both
>Roger Wilco and BattleCom.
>
> Ah ! you read it. Seems Roger Wilco has a memory bled that causes
>you to have to log off and restart it after a half hour because the
>communication degrads. BattleCom on the other hand was solid enough
>that Microsoft just brought them out to be able to make that internet
>audio actually PART of Windows 2000 for next summers release.
> Give me BattleCOM any time. Relogging breaks up parties :)
>
> You can DL BattleCom at http://www.shadowfactor.com/
> EVERYBODY should get this program and use it. I first ran into
a group
>using voice communications 2 weeks ago and they ran rings around
>other players in reacting to MOBs, tactics and all else. Having just
gotten
>killed because I couldn't type "everybody on the spell caster !"
fast enough
>
>I am a true believer. Now, If you see Moonflower around ask her to
>start a voice session !!! It will get to the point that is the only
way
>she will play.
>
>
